 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּצַע‎</span>] **verb** ==bruise, wound by bruising== (Late Hebrew ***split, bruise***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***squeeze*** a ripe date, ***rub***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּצַע‎</span> ***split***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכּוּנִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּצָעוּנִי‎</span> [[Song.5.7|Song 5:7]] ***Infinitive*** absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכֵּה וּפָצֹעַ‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.37|1Kgs 20:37]] ***a smiting and a bruising*** (him); ***Participle Pass.*** construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּצוּעַדַּֿכָּה‎</span> [[Deut.23.2|Deut 23:2]] ***one wounded by crushing.***
